alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 7:03PM MDT until August 29 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Madison County in southwestern Montana... Southeastern Beaverhead County in southwestern Montana... * Until 745 PM MDT. * At 702 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Dillon to 15 miles northeast of Monida to 9 miles northeast of Spencer, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Virginia City, Alder, Monida, Laurin, Lakeview, and Snowline. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall may also lead to minor flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
